title: mOsa bOkavE
sahitya:
nA morAlakinci nannu brOvavamma


anupallavi

  bhUmi velayu shrImadAdipuri tripurasundari


caraNam 1    nanu kAva rAdA amba nAmIda dyalEdA ninnu nammina vADugAdA nI madini dOca lEdA
    caraNam 2    iTuvaNTi vAdu Ishvari kArAdu haTamu sEya mEragAdu amba gati vErE lEdu
    caraNam 3    himagiri bAlA I bAdha tALa jAladamita kamsa gOpAladAsunipai kOpamEla
